subject: Re: Lively July news post
preview: Hi Sylvia, Sure, no probs, we have updated Megs photo, the position title and also included a skier carving up a storm! Makes me want to get down to the snow!! Let me know what you think?

full_threads.body:
Hi Sylvia, 

Sure, no probs, we have updated Megs photo, the position title and also included a skier carving up a storm! Makes me want to get down to the snow!! Let me know what you think?

Hi Heath,

Sorry, me again. Would you be able to d/l a more appropriate picture for the ski biomechanics blog? a picture of someone skiing?

Regards,
Sylvia

Lively Physiotherapy & Pilates Studio
'feel balanced, be healthy, become lively'
Phone: (02) 8065 0715 Fax: (02) 8065 0761
www.livelyphysio.com.au
Ground Floor, 1394 Pacific Hwy, Turramurra 2074 NSW
@heath done.

Hi Heath,

I've attached another version of Meg's mug pic. Lighter.

Also Sherrie's job title, could you change that to admin staff?

Many thanks,
Sylvia



Lively Physiotherapy & Pilates Studio

Best,
Sherrie

We have also updated the job titles as requested.
@manuel great thanks
@heath all done.

Hi Heath,

It's Meg Conlon. Also, can we please change the title for Anthony, Katie, Meg and myself to 'Admin staff' so we're all the same - thanks.

Best,
Sherrie

Hi Sherrie, 

Apologies I omitted to ask for Meg's full name and position. Would you mind sending it through?
@heath may I know Meg full name?
@manuel Thanks Manuel looks good ! Did you publish Meg's profile? I couldn't see it?
@heath done now.
@manuel Meg' photo is now attached too : )

@manuel thanks, can you please make the links pointing to external websites open in a new tab/window. This needs to be the case for any external links we add btw. 

Also, with the statistics box, the border design is something we haven't used any where else in the site. So perhaps you can give it the green background and change the font to white so that it fits with the design of the rest of the site.

Thanks
@heath ok now. https://www.livelyphysio.com.au/ski-biomechanics
@manuel Ok sure, I have attached the new article. There is also a new team member. I have attached the content for that and we are just waiting for an image of 'Meg'. Cheers

@heath actually I working on it but its ok since we will update later.

https://www.livelyphysio.com.au/ski-biomechanics/
@manuel please dont action this one until the client sends through the updated article. Thanks!

Hi Heath,

Thanks - would you mind holding off for a bit as Sylvia wants to double check it and add a pic? Please delete this copy and I will resend the update on Monday morning.

Have a great weekend!

Best,
Sherrie

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Manuel Lito Manceli

full_threads.body:
Hi Sherrie,

Sure we will upload this on Monday and let you know once it’s ready to review. Have a good weekend.
@manuel for Monday - thanks!

Hi Heath,

Please find attached the latest article for upload to our news page. Could you please let me know once it's ready so I can send out our newsletter?

Thanks!

Best wishes,
Sherrie
